name: Network | OAM | Exiting Master Loopback Mode
desciption: Interface has exited the master loopback mode

en.subject_template: Interface {{interface}} has exited the master loopback mode
en.body_template: Interface {{interface}} has exited the master loopback mode
en.probable_causes: The specified interface has entered or exited loopback mode because of protocol control or an external event, such as the interface link going down.
